title: For Optus users with the "issue" causing us to not connect to games
body:
I have tested 5 custom games and have gotten into 5 of them successfully, with no issues at all.

I would test other modes (normal, ranked), however I was warned by support that I wont get Leaverbuster removed for the second time, so im not going to take the risk until Riot 100% confirm the issue is fixed.

How many of you guys still have the issue? How many games have you played in a row, without any reconnect issues? 

Also, if a Mod reads this, Can I get leaverbuster for not connecting to a Bot (co-op vs intermediate AI) game? Otherwise I'd be willing to test a few games in that mode, since I can still play a bunch of champs and not risk the leaverbuster. Thanks.

replies.body: No more issues dude. I think you're safe {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
